book.runology.guidebook.name: Runic Codex
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.discover: I feel a strange and mysterious force... For whatever reason, I feel as if I should imbue some form of information storage with that power, A book will work.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.guidebook: After imbuing that strange power into a book, I have obtained powerful knowledge, this path, it may lead me to power! However... I can't help but wonder... What is that voice in my head telling me all of this?
These holes in space appear to lead to somewhere else, while I may not be able to cross them, I may be able to extract energy from them.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basic_run: There is 4 runes I can utilize to manipulate the world: [#](ff5d00)Heat[#](), [#](00d1ff)Frost[#](), [#](00ff00)Shape[#]() and [#](ffd100)Motion[#](). Utilizing these 4 is powerful but there has to be more...
emi.info.runology.guidebook: Obtain a Runic Codex by dropping a book nearby a Shatter
advancements.runology.runology.title: Runology
advancements.runology.shatter.title: Shatters
advancements.runology.shatter.descriptio: Discover a shatter in the world
